Description:
Ideal Investment
Centrally located to all Kangaroo Flat and Golden Square amenities as well as Primary and Secondary schools is this well appointed townhouse currently returning $280 per week.
Comprising of a fantastic open plan kitchen, meals area and lounge room downstairs along with a powder room and European laundry. The kitchen offers a gas cook top, electric wall oven, ample cupboard space and a dishwasher.
Upstairs you will find the 2 carpeted bedrooms, the main offers a large walk in robe through to the ensuite with double shower, which also offers adequate space. The remaining bedroom is conveniently located closely to the main bathroom and includes a built in robe for storage. Both bedrooms have direct access to the undercover and enclosed outdoor balcony. The property also features ducted heating and cooling throughout, a single garage and low maintenance enclosed courtyard to complete the package.
For information on this terrific property please contact the agent today!

Description:
CALLING ALL DEVELOPERS & INVESTORS
Situated in prime area of Kangaroo Flat. Close to all Kangaroo Flat facilities, shopping strip, Sports club, new aquatic pool and gym, schools and kindergartens.
Set on approx.. 1000 sqm allotment is this comfortable semi-modern weatherboard home, every room is larger than the normal, large lounge with gas heater, 2 large bedrooms, plus 3rd smaller bedroom, kitchen has gas cooking, with plenty of bench space and cupboards, and a large room that incorporates kitchen-meals area, compact bathroom with shower and vanity, laundry and rear sunroom. Add to the list externally single garage plus carport, other shedding all sited on flat allotment, all ideal for subdivision – STCA. So, this property can tick a few boxes, ideal as first home buyer, or those wanting a good old fashioned block , Developer, or Investor – all ready for the astute buyer.

Description:
A DELIGHTFUL SPACIOUS PROPERTY WITH ARCHITECT GROOVE
* Excellent renovated home.
* Four bedrooms plus study.
* Main bedroom with ensuite and WIR.
* Open plan living areas.
* Large family/rumpus room with Split System.
* Large double garage with direct access to the house.
* 800m² block (approx.) with entertaining area.
* New LED lighting, carpets and flooring, blockout blinds throughout.
* A MUST TO INSPECT!
A modern makeover to this architect -inspired home has created a fine place to raise a family.
The home has four genuine bedrooms as well as a separate study with library-style shelving. Multiple living zones include sunken lounge, formal dining, family space and a separate sitting room.
With personal access, the separate sitting room could become the parents lounge or your home-based office.
In the kitchen you will find a corner pantry, stainless steel wall oven, Bosch dishwasher and ample bench space.
More features are fitted robes, student desks, family bathroom, twin vanity and walk-through dressing to updated ensuite.
Fresh paint, new carpets, trendy tap ware, low-voltage lighting and energy-efficient climate control are welcome features.
The nicely elevated block measures more than 780 square metres with paved patio and double auto-garage.
Gardens are freshly mulched and the side courtyard captures the warming winter sun.
The hard work is done and the renovation is complete.
Just add your family and furniture, and enjoy the location. The property is just three blocks from the primary school with nearby childcare, secondary college, shopping centres and sporting facilities.

Description:
LIVING ON THE WATERS EDGE
This award-winning, multi-level home, once featured in Australia's Best Homes magazine, is the perfect fusion of colour, texture and atmosphere.
Architecturally designed to take advantage of the sloping corner lot on the foreshores of Forest Lake, it successfully combines contemporary fine living and comfort.
The commitment to quality is evident with high-end finishes and quality fittings throughout - no detail was overlooked during construction with far too many to mention here. Exceptional features include polished red ironbark floors for durability, double glazed windows, 10ft ceilings, zoned ducted floor heating and cooling with feature gas-log fire and surround-sound system in the living room.
From the grand entry foyer, step down into the magnificent modern living areas featuring spacious lounge, dining and kitchen areas opening to an alfresco deck.
If your'e passionate about cooking, this kitchen will make a lasting impression. Standing centre stage is a big solid granite waterfall island bench complimented by a full suite of Miele appliances including two ovens, warming drawer, range hood, integrated dishwasher and microwave with plumbed fridge space and butler's pantry with filtered water to the sink.
The dining area features a big picture window providing garden and water views while the adjoining alfresco deck includes privacy/weather screens and natural gas barbecue. Imagine enjoying a leisurely meal with uninterrupted lake views where a pair of black swans are currently keeping close watch over their bevy of babies.
The secluded five-star-worthy main suite includes extensive walk-through dressing room with robes and huge ensuite featuring spa bath, oversized shower, twin vanities and separate WC.
Bedrooms 2 and 3 each include a wall of robes and share the main bathroom while the central hallway is home to a walk-in linen store, large powder room, laundry with built in cabinetry and a light-filled study overlooking north-facing courtyard and rear gardens.
Home office/rumpus room, 4th WC, cellar workshop, storeroom, double garage and double carport are all located at ground level with a connecting stairwell to the kitchen.
Embraced by stunning landscaped grounds featuring sweeping lawns and colourful garden beds automatically maintained with a sprinkler system fed by rain water tanks and town water.
Be prepared to be impressed by this dynamic statement in style, it's custom-made perfection.

Description:
Contemporary-style relaxation and convenience
Wise words of Benjamin Franklin in practice, 'a place for everything and everything in its place', is embodied by this 2-year-old property. Impeccably presented, stunning timber floors bring welcome contrast and visual warmth to the decor. Highly efficient, the 1 bedroom plus study floorplan has no hallways to waste expenditure on unutilised energy, by not heating and cooling unused spaces.
This is evident in the European-style laundry and galley kitchen, where quality fittings and finishes include stone benchtops and a sleek ceramic glass cooktop. As well as a light-filled living-dining room, there is a substantial computer room for use as a home office. Lit by an interior window during the day, a spacious shower-room also contains the toilet and vanity. Reverse cycle air-conditioning sustains continuous relief from external temperatures.
A complete wall of built-in robes supplies sufficient storage in the bedroom and a glass sliding door provides a second entry point into the rear courtyard. Backing onto crown-owned bushland bestows a beautiful backdrop to barbeques. Entirely landscaped grounds in attractive yet easy to care for fashion makes life even more restful at this address. An extra-wide single carport has your vehicle covered too.
This surprisingly handy location is within 8 to 20 minutes stroll of shopping, sports club, leisure centre, pub, medical facilities, train station and much more. Bus stops are around the corner, Bendigo is just 5 kilometres away, Melbourne under 150 into the CBD.
It's a townhouse that truly encapsulates a lifestyle of relaxation and convenience.
Insights: 4/21 John Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
A winner for the beginner.
This well-maintained property is convenience with a capital C.
Perfectly positioned a stone's throw from Kangaroo Flat Railway station, shops, medical practice, Lions Park, schools, the new Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre & public transport it's a great opportunity for first home buyers, downsizers, investors or young families.
The scene is set for comfortable living within this fully renovated home where the light-filled interior boasts fresh paintwork and new floor coverings throughout.
The spacious living room features a new gas log fire in a stone-look fireplace, ceiling fan and split system air conditioning, adjoining new kitchen includes gas/electric cooking, good storage and island bench breakfast bar beside the roomy dining area, three bedrooms, renovated bathroom, laundry and WC complete the interior.
The back verandah has been converted to a cool, green area for relaxing or alfresco dining while the manicured backyard is divided into a securely fenced lawn area to contain toddlers or pets and concreted traffic areas.
The 7.3m x 6m shed with twin roller doors does double duty as a garage and workshop with benches, storage, lights and power while a concrete pad alongside provides space for off-street parking big enough for caravan, work vehicles etc.

Description:
A winner for the beginner.
This well-maintained property is convenience with a capital C.
Perfectly positioned a stone's throw from Kangaroo Flat Railway station, shops, medical practice, Lions Park, schools, the new Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre & public transport it's a great opportunity for first home buyers, downsizers, investors or young families.
The scene is set for comfortable living within this fully renovated home where the light-filled interior boasts fresh paintwork and new floor coverings throughout.
The spacious living room features a new gas log fire in a stone-look fireplace, ceiling fan and split system air conditioning, adjoining new kitchen includes gas/electric cooking, good storage and island bench breakfast bar beside the roomy dining area, three bedrooms, renovated bathroom, laundry and WC complete the interior.
The back verandah has been converted to a cool, green area for relaxing or alfresco dining while the manicured backyard is divided into a securely fenced lawn area to contain toddlers or pets and concreted traffic areas.
The 7.3m x 6m shed with twin roller doors does double duty as a garage and workshop with benches, storage, lights and power while a concrete pad alongside provides space for off-street parking big enough for caravan, work vehicles etc.

Description:
DON'T MISS THIS ONE
Great first home or investment property! Look at this neat, low-maintenance, brick veneer home on a good sized 697sqm allotment.
This home offers three bedrooms, all with built-in wardrobes and ceiling fans, along with an updated bathroom. Living is easy with a spacious lounge equipped with gas heating & split system air conditioning. Cooking for the family will be a breeze in the roomy kitchen, with upright stove gas cook top and electric oven, pantry cupboard & breakfast bar for casual meals.
Glass doors from the meals/family area slide back to reveal a covered alfresco area overlooking the family-friendly backyard, where there's plenty of room and is safe and secure for toddlers or pets, with lock-up gates providing rear access through the double carport, plus a single lockup garage with attached workshop for the tradies, gardeners and tinkerers. A 3kW Solar system is a great help with the power bills.
Situated close to Lansell Square Shopping Centre, public transport, schools & public recreation facilities. Great for first time home owners, investors, improvers or downsizers.

Description:
Views, gardens and a sense of grandeur
From behind a veil of fully established leafy green garden emerges a beautiful family home with views across the treetops. Quality built, the double brick, split level residence is impeccably presented and has been meticulously maintained throughout its life. There’s a sense of grandeur about this home, perhaps it’s the wide stairway to the upper level, maybe it’s the airy open plan design, I’m not sure but whatever it is just adds to the wow factor.
With a list a features sure to impress including:
• Two light filled living areas. A spacious main living area with views of the beautiful surrounding gardens and beyond. The second living area is a bit cosier and a great space to retreat to.
• A modern kitchen, complete with stainless steel electric oven, electric cooktop and dishwasher and plenty of cupboards and bench space.
• A dining room with a view and access to an outdoor entertaining area.
• Three bedrooms. The main bedroom has three floor to ceiling built-in robes, ensuite and French style doors to access the private backyard. The remaining two bedrooms are on the upper level. Both have built-in robes and are easily able to accommodate a queen bed ensemble.
• A study with a huge storage cupboard and a convenient bathroom for the lower level.
• The upper level has the main bathroom with shower, vanity and children’s bath. This level also has the laundry and access to the backyard.
• Ducted evaporative cooling and gas ducted heating maintain the climate control and a gas log fire heater in the main lounge is an additional option for cooler nights.
The 889m2 allotment is completely landscaped but is very low maintenance. Solar panels keep the cost of energy at bay and a water tank connected to the bathroom keeps water consumption to a minimum.
Located on the Melbourne side of Bendigo at the end of a private court within walking distance of the new Gurri Wanyarra Wellbeing Centre. Close to walking tracks, primary and secondary schools, medical practices, Lansell Square Shopping Centre, Kangaroo Flat Train Station and less than a 10-minute drive to Central Bendigo.
Insights: 6 Edmund Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Desirable family home in great location
- Stylish family home (Built 2007) offering 4 bedrooms and two living areas
- Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite
- Modern kitchen with ample drawers, double oven, Large walk in pantry, dishwasher, gas cooktop and electric oven
- Large family room with effective gas log fire for warmth and ambience
- Double garage, zincalum garden shed, raised wicking vege bed, pizza oven, rainwater tanks
- Solar power (3kwt), split systems for all seasons. Ample room for off street parking.
- Lovely entertainment area/leafy green fernery, cherry tree, front verandah, space for caravan etc
- Close to Big Hill Primary, walk to KMart, only one hour to Melbourne airport
This very nice designed home is 11 years young and is a beautiful spacious family home on a 693m2 allotment. This charming residence includes a generous lounge with lovely bay window and a large open plan kitchen/meals and family room. The master ensuite has a spa shower and foot spa with thermostatic temperature controls for safety plus wheelchair access.
